name: Unikitty! Save the Kingdom!
summary: Help Unikitty and her friends travel the land to banish the Doom Lords, fix the problems in the Kingdom and cheer up the citizens. Collect as much Sparkle Matter as you can along the way! Play as Unikitty, Puppycorn, Hawkodile and Dr Fox - each character has unique skills that are needed to get through the levels.
